Fields.abstract: The electromagnetic and gravitational multipole moments of stationary sources in general relativity are obtained in the conformal picture in terms of the expansion coefficients of the electrovacuum potentials on the axis of symmetry. Generic expressions for the values of the first five multipole moments are given, and the field of a pure pole-dipole source is investigated.
